name: Dispatching_base_num
description: The TLC base license number of the base that dispatched the taxicab.

name: Pickup_datetime
description: The date and time when the meter was engaged.

name: DropOff_datetime
description: The date and time when the meter was disengaged.

name: PULocationID
description: A code for the TLC taxi zone for the pickup location.

name: DOLocationID
description: A code for the TLC taxi zone for the dropoff location.

name: SR_Flag
description: This flag indicates whether the trip was a part of a shared ride.
